question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
Compute
\[\sum_{n = 1}^\infty \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}},\]where $F_n$ denotes the $n$th Fibonacci number, so $F_0 = 0$ and $F_1 = 1.$
inference:
Solution:
We can write
\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} &= \frac{F_{n + 1}}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} \\
&= \frac{F_{n + 2} - F_n}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} \\
&= \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 1}} - \frac{1}{F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}}.
\end{align*}Hence,
\[\sum_{n = 1}^\infty \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} = \left( \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} - \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} - \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} - \frac{1}{F_4 F_5} \right) + \dotsb = \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} = \boxed{1}.\]
Final Answer: $\boxed{1}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth:
We can get the sum to telescope by writing
\[\frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} = \frac{F_{n + 1}}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}}.\]Since $F_{n + 1} = F_{n + 2} - F_n,$
\[\frac{F_{n + 1}}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} = \frac{F_{n + 2} - F_n}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} = \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 1}} - \frac{1}{F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}}.\]Then
\begin{align*}
\sum_{n = 1}^\infty \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} &= \left( \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} - \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} - \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} - \frac{1}{F_4 F_5} \right) + \dotsb \\
&= \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} \\
&= \boxed{1}.
\end{align*}

ground_truth:
We can get the sum to telescope by writing
\[\frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} = \frac{F_{n + 1}}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}}.\]Since $F_{n + 1} = F_{n + 2} - F_n,$
\[\frac{F_{n + 1}}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} = \frac{F_{n + 2} - F_n}{F_n F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}} = \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 1}} - \frac{1}{F_{n + 1} F_{n + 2}}.\]Then
\begin{align*}
\sum_{n = 1}^\infty \frac{1}{F_n F_{n + 2}} &= \left( \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} - \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_2 F_3} - \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} \right) + \left( \frac{1}{F_3 F_4} - \frac{1}{F_4 F_5} \right) + \dotsb \\
&= \frac{1}{F_1 F_2} \\
&= \boxed{1}.
\end{align*}
